briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for Light Lightness Server model.

memberdef.name: BT_MESH_MODEL_LIGHTNESS_SRV
memberdef.initializer: BT_MESH_MODEL_LVL_SRV(&(_srv)->lvl), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_PONOFF_SRV(&(_srv)->ponoff), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_LIGHTNESS_SRV, \ _bt_mesh_lightness_srv_op, &(_srv)->pub, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA(struct bt_mesh_lightness_srv, \ _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_lightness_srv_cb), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_LIGHTNESS_SETUP_SRV, \ _bt_mesh_lightness_setup_srv_op, NULL, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA(struct bt_mesh_lightness_srv, \ _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_lightness_setup_srv_cb)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Light Lightness Server model instance.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_lightness_srv *srv, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_lightness_status *status)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_lightness_srv_pub

detaileddescription.para: Publishes a Light Lightness status message with the configured publish parameters, or using the given message context.

simplesect.para: This API is only used for publishing unprompted status messages. Response messages for get and set messages are handled internally.

parameterdescription.para: Message context, or NULL to publish with the configured parameters.

simplesect.para: 0 Successfully published the current Light state.

parameterdescription.para: A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
